title: OpenAI o1 â€” AI Tool Review
description: OpenAI o1 is a reasoning-first AI model that 'thinks before answering,' excelling at complex math, science, and coding problems that require deep step-by-step logic. OpenAI o1 is OpenAI's reasoning-focused model series that uses chain-of-thought reasoning to solve complex problems. Unlike GPT-4 which answers immediately, o1 spends time 'thinking' through problems step by step, achieving state-of-the-art results on math olympiad problems, competitive coding, and scientific reasoning. Available to ChatGPT Plus users and via API. Highlights: Exceptional math and science reasoning. PhD-level problem solving. Handles ambiguous multi-step problems. Strong at competitive programming. Transparent reasoning process.
